# GitHub Copilot Instructions - OAuth 2.0 Backend

## Project Overview
This is an OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server built with Go and Echo framework, using Dependency Injection pattern with Uber Dig.

## Documentation Structure
This project has organized Copilot instructions in multiple files:

- **copilot-instructions.md** (this file) - Main overview
- **copilot-architecture.md** - Stack, structure, and module path
- **copilot-dependency-injection.md** - DI pattern and implementation flow
- **copilot-coding-rules.md** - Code style, error handling, and best practices
- **copilot-git-conventions.md** - Commit message standards

All files are in `.github/` and are automatically recognized by GitHub Copilot.
